order by id

WITH cte as( SELECT a.* FROM Dim_Organization a WHERE a.organKey = #{plantCode} UNION ALL SELECT b.* FROM Dim_Organization b INNER JOIN cte ON cte.organKey = b.organParentId ) SELECT sot.*,so.originalName,do.organKey AS plantCode, do.organName plantName,sod.originalValue, #{storeDate} AS storeDate,sod.inputDate,so.dateType, so.originalDesc,sod.originalDataVersion,sod.id dataId FROM SYS_ORIGINAL_TYPE sot LEFT JOIN SYS_ORIGINAL so ON sot.originalCode=so.originalCode LEFT JOIN Dim_Organization do ON so.plantCode=do.organKey LEFT JOIN SYS_ORIGINAL_DATA sod ON sod.originalCode=sot.originalCode AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,sod.storeDate,120) LIKE '${storeDate}%' WHERE sot.organKey IN (SELECT cte.organKey FROM cte) AND sot.dataType=#{dataType}
AND so.dateType = #{dateType}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ORIGINAL_TYPE ( originalCode , dataType , dataOrder , )values ( #{originalCode} , #{dataType} , #{dataOrder} )
